description:
Danilo Segan discovered that Gettext mishandled certain input. An
attacker could use this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code.

php-gettext.description: PHP library to collect and manipulate gettext
PHP library to collect and manipulate gettext

title: Gettext vulnerability
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary:
Gettext could be made to crash or run programs if it received
specially crafted input.
